I am playing Youtuber Dash, its amazing there are a lot of youtubers you can use! tell me if you like it! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mgl.youtuberunner
To unlock this level login with Twitter
Soon we will upload new levels!
Tap screen to fly, release to fall!
You must to kill all enemies first
You need a key to Open this door

Hi Ninja Im your master, now learn: 1 to move touch the map, 2 dont get catch by the enemy or you will loose, 3 to knock out an enemy touch him, try with this one! 4 after do it go to the yellow door and pass throw it to win!

Well, now you should know that not all the time you can knock out your enemies some times if you do it you loose, I will tell you, there are some missions where you should pass away throw enemies whiout been catch it and hurt them!
Next Mission, you should make noise, para use the musical note button, this will attract the enemy, while you pass whiout been detected, dont hit anybody
Well done, now you should learn how to open doors, doors can be opened in differents ways, 1) stand up in front of them 2) some doors needs a key, and only be oppened with the correct key! good luck!
Finally levers, levers can open and close doors, levers can open one door or more, try with those levers, and then scape with all the tools you have learned! arrive until the yellow door
WOW, now a riddle or a puzzle, play with the levers to solve it!
I hope you have done a good combination with the levers, if not this door cant be oppened

Until here your training Ninja, I hope you have learned and enjoy it, please tell to developers what do you like it, what dont you like and things that you think that can be improved! this is really important to us!
